topic.title: i need a QQ number,someone can help me?
topic.body: hi guys i can't register a qq number.i don't know why.my phone can't send a message to tencent.if anyone give me a number,i will pay you bitcoins .zeromail to me . thanks

1_14eUCVpQR3kAgx1MAps9VFtUUofLGmZZ1S.body:
> [chinabiz](#comment_18_1DWrKbEomgBLHjczm1HkP556Vg68ewDmyd): lol, are you going to use QQ international?Why not register on the PC first and just use the details on your phone?BTW, if you use QQ international, you do know that neither the PC version nor the Android version have been updated since 2014, that's about 2.5 years without any security, or any other updates, period.

hi bro.,thanks for the reply. i  like a chinese girl .i  know her QQ number.so i need one, can u help me?i will pay u.pls

> [urara](#comment_1_1PSaozQBmgoycgWkPCGuf38oqAqGtMefAR): hi there, i can help,  but please tell me if you can read chinese?

yes , i can type chinese, use google translate. i will zeromail to u ,thanks for your help
